group_1.textRight: There's a problem with your family?

group_1.textLeft: My family runs a small factory.
There are just a few workers.@It's like the typical small-town factory.
But they're so good at what they do that@they get orders from huge companies!
I just love our little factory!@So do my mom and dad...
But I'm the only child.@So that means...

group_1.narration: Kanoko! I'm begging you!@Please take over the factory after us!

group_1.textLeft: ...That's what they always ask me.
I understand how my dad feels![chara:300101:lipSynch_0][freeze:1][chara:300101:cheek_0][chara:300101:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:300101:lipSynch_1] He @worked so hard to perfect our technology...
But I have a dream of my own!@A dream I have to chase!
I help out here and there, so they told @me to work at the factory after I graduate.
But I don't want that!@Then I'll be totally trapped...
I want to study fashion design in college!
I want to grow up to be a successful@fashion designer.
I don't want to give up without even trying!

group_1.textRight: There's no one else who can take over@the factory?

group_1.textLeft: No one.
A fashion designer!

group_1.textRight: Then you have to give up on the factory.

group_1.textLeft: But I can't do that!@I would feel horrible!
Can you understand how hard this is?!

group_1.textRight: No, I cannot understand the struggles you@humans suffer with, but...
Should I make the factory so successful that@it won't ever fail?

group_1.textLeft: No, that's not right either! That'd be the@whole miracle-gone-wrong thing again!
Just wait, okay? I'm still thinking!
It needs to be solved naturally...@And yet decisively...
